title: Personal protective equipment items issued
description: Management information update on personal protective equipment (PPE) items issued during the Coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic up to 21 June 2020
datasetNotes: On the landing page the data is embedded in the page. this is the first publication so the landing page may be subject to change
sizingNotes: Simple Table which is embedded in the page it may be possible to contact the producer to obtain in a different format.
notes: When this is due for transformation BAs will contact the producer to see if the data is available in a better format than the embedded tables.
